channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 美国称，胡塞武装袭击造成至少两名船员死亡，这是该组织在也门附近发动袭击以来造成的首例船上死亡事件
item.description:
At least two crew members are dead after a Houthi strike -- the first on-ship deaths caused by the group since their attacks near Yemen, US says https://t.co/JhMNvjipkF

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 明尼苏达州众议员迪安-菲利普斯结束了他在民主党初选中对总统乔-拜登的长期挑战
item.description:
Minnesota Rep. Dean Phillips is ending his long-shot Democratic primary challenge to President Joe Biden https://t.co/pC82jw3e18

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一枚俄罗斯导弹击中乌克兰总统泽连斯基与希腊总理会晤地点附近
item.description:
A Russian missile struck near a meeting between Ukrainian President Zelensky and Greece's prime ministerhttps://t.co/1AwB6eCSwz

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 参议院共和党领袖米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）宣布将支持唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）竞选总统。
item.description:
Senate GOP Leader Mitch McConnell announces he'll support Donald Trump for the presidency, a move that comes more than three years after they last spoke https://t.co/qgSGrvjNwJ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑莉在 "超级星期二 "失利后暂停参加共和党总统竞选，唐纳德-特朗普成为推定提名人
item.description:
Nikki Haley suspends her GOP presidential campaign after Super Tuesday losses, leaving Donald Trump as the presumptive nominee https://t.co/9D3hRSCUcz

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据熟悉尼基-黑莉计划的消息人士透露，她将于今天宣布退出总统竞选
item.description:
Nikki Haley will announce today that she is exiting the presidential race, according to sources familiar with her plans https://t.co/i1z6wDjIUU

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）报道，民主党众议员亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）和共和党人史蒂夫-加维（Steve Garvey）将在加州参议员竞选中晋级，角逐已故黛安-范斯坦（Dianne Feinstein）的席位。
item.description:
Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff and Republican Steve Garvey will advance in California's Senate race for the late Dianne Feinstein's seat, CNN projects https://t.co/8ET0d8OOdL

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: CNN 预测民主党众议员亚当-希夫在加州参议院 争夺黛安-范斯坦席位的竞选中胜出现在预测他在 11 月的对手还为时过早。
item.description:
CNN projection: Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff advances in California's Senate race for Dianne Feinstein's seat. It's too soon to project who he'll face in November. https://t.co/eSQbfa5AMM

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: CNN 预测众议员科林-阿尔雷德将赢得得克萨斯州民主党参议员提名，并在 11 月迎战共和党人特德-克鲁兹
item.description:
CNN projection: Rep. Colin Allred will win the Texas Democratic nomination for US Senate and face Republican Ted Cruz in November https://t.co/aPVmkOafpt

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: CNN 预测：拜登和特朗普在加利福尼亚州赢得当晚最大奖项，黑莉在佛蒙特州出人意料地获胜
item.description:
CNN projection: Biden and Trump win the biggest prize of the night in California, and Haley pulls off surprising win in Vermont https://t.co/LP6scsJEZG

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，杰森-帕尔默将赢得美属萨摩亚民主党总统党团会议，拜登将成为本初选季迄今为止唯一的败将
item.description:
Jason Palmer will win the American Samoa Democratic presidential caucuses, CNN projects, handing Biden his only defeat so far this primary season https://t.co/y1zivkEXuX

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: CNN 预测：共和党副州长马克-罗宾逊和民主党总检察长乔希-斯坦将在北卡罗来纳州州长竞选中对决
item.description:
CNN projection: Republican Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson and Democratic Attorney General Josh Stein will face each other in North Carolina governor's race https://t.co/roSOgZQTkY

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 随着一些州的投票结束，"超级星期二 "的投票结果也在不断出炉。以下是目前的进展情况。
item.description:
Results from Super Tuesday continue to roll in as polls close in some states. Here's where things stand right now. https://t.co/AhgVRnrLl2

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 参议员鲍勃-梅嫩德斯因涉及埃及和卡塔尔政府的贿赂计划而面临十几项新的刑事指控
item.description:
Sen. Bob Menendez faces a dozen new criminal charges related to a bribery scheme involving the governments of Egypt and Qatar https://t.co/Ry89sSv9Qd

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 亚利桑那州独立参议员 Kyrsten Sinema 宣布将在今年任期结束时退休
item.description:
Sen. Kyrsten Sinema, an Arizona independent, announces she will retire at the end of her term this year https://t.co/LAUnz9prxN

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 由于公司所谓的 "技术问题"，包括 Facebook 和 Instagram 在内的 Meta 平台于周二对数千名用户造成了影响。
item.description:
Meta’s platforms, including Facebook and Instagram, went down for thousands of users on Tuesday, because of what the company called a “technical issue" https://t.co/7l3QHXmZ3s

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 母公司 Meta 表示，Facebook、Instagram 和 Threads 正在经历大面积故障
item.description:
Facebook, Instagram and Threads are experiencing widespread outages, parent company Meta says https://t.co/12M36fTLYP

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 底特律北部发生大火，火势蔓延至一英里之外，官员称有一人在大火中丧生
item.description:
One person was killed in a towering fire north of Detroit that sent debris as far as a mile away, officials say https://t.co/D6e6WWjZ5B

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，前总统唐纳德-特朗普将赢得北达科他州的共和党总统党团会议，这是在 "超级星期二 "竞选活动扩大到 15 个州之前的最后一次助选。
item.description:
Former President Donald Trump will win North Dakota’s Republican presidential caucuses, CNN projects, claiming one final boost before the campaign expands to 15 states on Super Tuesday. https://t.co/cT8EIhfqbN

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在拜登政府提出紧急请求后，最高法院暂时冻结了得克萨斯州有争议的移民法的执行
item.description:
Supreme Court temporarily freezes enforcement of Texas' controversial immigration law after the Biden administration filed an emergency request https://t.co/wb2CHgMr2u

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 一位高级官员说，一个联合国小组发现了 "明确而令人信服的信息"，加沙的一些人质遭受了性暴力侵害
item.description:
A United Nations team found "clear and convincing information" that some hostages in Gaza were subjected to sexual violence, a top official says https://t.co/ASqh8rzNBR

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 杰森-凯尔斯（Jason Kelce）宣布从美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）退役。这位明星中锋的整个职业生涯都在费城老鹰队度过，并在 2018 年赢得了超级碗。
item.description:
Jason Kelce announces his retirement from the NFL. The star center spent his entire career with the Philadelphia Eagles and won a Super Bowl in 2018. https://t.co/xVu4VSl4Nw

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在美国最高法院推翻 "罗伊诉韦德 "案的推动下，法国成为第一个将堕胎权写入宪法的国家
item.description:
France becomes the first country to enshrine abortion rights in its constitution, a move prompted by the US Supreme Court's overturning of Roe v. Wadehttps://t.co/A4WYamY6c0

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 空军国民警卫队队员杰克-特谢拉承认在社交媒体上发布敏感的美国国防信息

item.title: 最高法院将特朗普留在科罗拉多州选票上，驳回对第 14 修正案的质疑
item.description:
Supreme Court keeps Trump on the Colorado ballot, rejecting a 14th Amendment challenge https://t.co/9oJKGo6VcM

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 捷蓝航空公司宣布退出收购精神航空公司的交易
item.description:
JetBlue Airways announces it is pulling out of its deal to purchase Spirit Airlines https://t.co/xyX6oewk9J

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 特朗普组织前财务主管预计将因在纽约州前总统民事欺诈案中的证词而承认伪证罪指控
item.description:
The ex-Trump Organization finance chief is expected to plead guilty to perjury charges over testimony in the former president's NY civil fraud trial https://t.co/feh26q7Xfj

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 苹果因阻止竞争对手的音乐流媒体服务告知 iPhone 用户更便宜的订阅选择而被欧盟罚款 20 亿美元
item.description:
Apple fined $2 billion in EU for preventing rival music streaming services from telling iPhone users about cheaper subscription options https://t.co/BH5O04IyKF

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，尼基-黑利将在华盛顿特区的共和党总统初选中获胜。这是她在共和党初选中首次战胜领跑者唐纳德-特朗普。
item.description:
Nikki Haley will win the Republican presidential primary in Washington, DC, CNN projects. It's her first victory of the GOP primary over front-runner Donald Trump. https://t.co/dDY2T2eTst

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024
